title: Deselected Skins
body: I've been playing team builder a lot recently, and roughly 3 out of 4 games I use a skin in, will have the skin deselected regardless of what I do in the pregame lobby. It's frustrating as all hell that I bought these skins and can't use them in team builder.

replies.body: Or Riot can simply fix it. This should be a top priority. Why bother spending money on skins if they don't work?
After the last path my Vlad Marquis isn't showing in team builder.  Wanted to bump the post, so devs notice.  Thanks.
I'm having the same problem. I'll have my selected skin in team builder, but then I won't have it in game.

I'm told that you have to select another skin then select the one you want to use.

Every time.

Have you tried that?
